name: purgequeue
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool maytapi_whatsapp.
Tool description: Send and receive messages from WhatsApp via Maytapi. It is a stable and reliable solution. See more:  https://maytapi.com/
API description: Clears the send message queue for a given phone ID using the Maytapi WhatsApp API.

phone_id.description: The ID of the phone whose message queue is to be purged.
